# mssql Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "mssql" {
  connection_string = "sqlserver://sa:p@ssw0rd@localhost:1433"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `connection_string` (String) For connecting to MSSQL Server
